title: [W] Case Number Check
label: [W] What is your case number?
hint: [W] This will appear on the letter sent to you from the employment tribunal.

ethosCaseReference.required: [W] Enter case number. Sample case number format is 1111111/2020
ethosCaseReference.invalid: [W] Invalid case number. Sample Case number format is 1111111/2020
ethosCaseReference.caseNotFound: [W] Case Not Found. The entered case number does not match our records.
